name: Mas Kiri Hodi Seasoning Cube
description: Introducing Ma`s Kitchen Kiri Hodi Seasoning Cube, a culinary gem that unlocks the true essence of Sri Lankan traditional milk-based curries. Ma`s Kitchen Kiri Hodi seasoning cube is meticulously crafted not only to enhance the taste & aroma of your recipes but mainly to make cooking quick and simple *Images for illustration purpose only, Product received may vary.
